title: Sirimevan Widyasekera
text:
<a href="Professor">Professor</a> Sirimevan Widyasekera is the Professor of Medical Physics and Dean of the Faculty of ICT and Media at the <a href="South%20Asian%20Institute%20of%20Technology%20and%20Medicine">South Asian Institute of Technology and Medicine</a> Sri Lanka.
Sirimevan after receiving his education from <a href="Nalanda%20College%20Colombo">Nalanda College Colombo</a> and graduated from <a href="University%20of%20Colombo">University of Colombo</a> with a <a href="Bachelor%20of%20Science">Bachelor of Science</a> specialising in <a href="Physics">Physics</a>. Later he graduated from <a href="Uppsala%20University">Uppsala University</a> <a href="Sweden">Sweden</a> with a <a href="Doctor%20of%20Philosophy">Doctor of Philosophy</a> in Physics.
